block.crackToClaim: Crack the password to claim the reward

signup.title: Join Brute Force
signup.emailConsent: [Optional] I agree to receive emails about game updates, major events, and reward opportunities.
signup.whyEmail: Why do we need your email?
signup.emailReason1: To notify you of important game events, such as when a Block is solved or when your similarity score beats top record.
signup.emailReason2: To serve as a secure channel for future rewards distribution (Phase 2 Economy).
signup.countryDisclaimer: * Country information is collected solely for purpose of global/regional ranking aggregation.
signup.upgradeSuccess: Account upgraded! Please check your email to verify your permanent access.
signup.signupSuccess: Signup complete. Please check your email to verify your account.
signup.secureGuestDesc: You are currently operating on a temporary guest frequency. Converting to a permanent agent account will preserve your accumulated history, rank, and computing power.
signup.joinBruteForce: Brute Force is a massive multiplayer social hacking simulation. To participate in global effort to decrypt blocks, authentication is required to maintain integrity of the ledger.
signup.upgradeAccessDesc: Enter your details to finalize your permanent agent profile.
signup.createAccountDesc: Enter your details to generate your access key.

ranking.title: Global Leaderboard
ranking.description: See top hackers in Brute Force AI

victory.waitingNextBlock: Waiting for the next block to be created...
